meanings.sent1: The biocides in the cleaning solution killed all the germs on the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use biocides to protect their crops from pests and diseases.
meanings.sent3: The biocides in the spray were so effective that even the ants ran away!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like biocides, wiping out any doubts in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The biocides worked like tiny soldiers, battling against the harmful bacteria.

meanings.definition: Agents that inhibit the growth of living organisms.
meanings.sent1: The biocides in the soil slowed down the growth of the weeds.
meanings.sent2: Biocides are commonly used in hospitals to prevent the spread of infections.
meanings.sent3: The biocides acted like traffic lights, stopping the bacteria from multiplying.
meanings.sent4: His words were like biocides to her dreams, halting their progress.
meanings.sent5: The biocides functioned as guardians, preventing the microbes from spreading.

meanings.definition: Chemicals used to control pests or pathogens.
meanings.sent1: The farmer sprayed biocides on the crops to keep away the insects.
meanings.sent2: Biocides are essential in maintaining the cleanliness of swimming pools.
meanings.sent3: The biocides danced around the pests, making them dizzy and confused.
meanings.sent4: The biocides were like superheroes, swooping in to save the plants from harm.
meanings.sent5: The biocides functioned as a shield, protecting the plants from harmful invaders.
